name: Peruse
description: A simple plaform for creating highly readable single-page client-side online books.

scripts.build: set -e -o pipefail; browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env @babel/preset-react ] ] peruse.js | uglifyjs > build/bundle.js; cp build/bundle.js build/peruse.js; rm build/bundle.js
scripts.deploy: ssh -t ajko@ovid.u.washington.edu "cd public_html && cd books && cd peruse && git pull && npm run build"
